@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The Radio button for mobile. Example 

    var form = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Form();
    var radio1 = new qx.ui.mobile.form.RadioButton();
    var radio2 = new qx.ui.mobile.form.RadioButton();
    var radio3 = new qx.ui.mobile.form.RadioButton();
    var group = new qx.ui.mobile.form.RadioGroup(radio1, radio2, radio3);
    form.add(radio1, "Germany");
    form.add(radio2, "UK");
    form.add(radio3, "USA");
    this.getRoot.add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.Single(form));

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean?null} The value of the checkbox.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the selection value is changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} the new radio group to which this radio button belongs.
@param.description: the new radio group to which this radio button belongs.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: old {qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} the old radio group of this radio button.
@param.description: the old radio group of this radio button.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the value [true/false] of this radio button. It is called by setValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean} the new value of the radio button
@param.description: the new value of the radio button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the value [true/false] of this radio button. It is called by getValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} the value of the radio button
@return.description: the value of the radio button
